creator: marcs@znep.com
text:
the clean-native target in jakarta-tomcat-connectors/jk/build.xml is empty. 
Although the native target is somewhat sketchy to begin with, as long as the
clean-native target is there it should have something in it that will work.

One suggestion:

    <target name="clean-native">
        <ant  dir="native" antfile="build.xml" target="clean"  />
        <ant  dir="native2" antfile="build.xml" target="clean"  />
    </target>
I have committed your proposed change to CVS. Thanks for the suggestion.
creator: markt@apache.org
